ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Overthere to Oasis
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Can anyone tell me if there is any advantage to being anything other than agnostic for most classes?  I picked one of the Marrs back in April 99, and it s
ygData.messageBody:
Jamie Furtner wrote:

> If you are agonistic or a worshipper of Bristlebane, and have never taken a
> VentrilSavil faction hit, you should be fine.

Can anyone tell me if there is any advantage to being anything other than agnostic for most classes? I
picked one of the Marrs back in April '99, and it's pretty annoying that both the Mask of Deception and
the Iksar Hide Mask are, essentially, utterly worthless as a consequence. I'm a Half Elf, I don't need
the vision stuff.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 51 songs, Innoruuk
